Literature.Title: Interplay among folding, sequence, and lipophilicity in the antibacterial and hemolytic activities of alpha/beta-peptides.
Literature.Author: Schmitt MA, Weisblum B, Gellman SH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli JM109(MIC=6.3µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis BR151(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 1206(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium A634(MIC=25µg/ml)
